title: When my phone is being charged, why does the screen always stay on?
answer: Go to Developer options to adjust this behavior. Developer options is hidden by default. 1. To show Developer options in the settings menu, go to Settings and touch About phone. 1. Touch Build number 7 times in succession. A notification will appear saying you have entered Developer mode. 1. Go back to Settings and touch Developer options. Clear the Stay awake check box. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140233) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140234) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140235)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140236) []()![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140237) The figures are for your reference only.
